name: Protect My Short Necked Friends (LD46)
description:
A game built in less than 48 hours from scratch for Ludum Dare 46.

Unfortunately I massively ran out of time and couldn't complete a fraction of the features I had planned.

Objective: Keep the sheep alive throughout the waves to get to the next level.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left click: Spit
  • Right click: Headbutt
